Detailed Description

Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.

Loop through the probesets provided and calculate a contrast value for each one using the median of PM probes for A allele and B allele.

(CES constrast space)

Parameters:
cel - Cel File to get data from.
chrXProbeSets - Probesets to process (should be chrX non-pseudo autosomal).
contrastValues - Contrast values vector to be filled in.
